title: Wonders of growing plants. - 2nd. ed.
brief_description: Two children plant lima beans in a glass with blotting paper that soaks up water to keep the seeds moist. Time-lapse photography is used to show the growth of the plants. Other methods of growing plants, such as from roots, stems and leaves are shown. No other credits available.
